title: Boomika (Hindi)
short_cast: Aishwarya Rajesh, Vidhu, Surya Ganapathy, Madhuri, Pavel Navageethan, Avantika Vandanapu
cast: Aishwarya Rajesh, Vidhu, Surya Ganapathy, Madhuri, Pavel Navageethan, Avantika Vandanapu

desc: Paranormal activity at a lush, abandoned property alarms a group eager to redevelop the site, but the eerie events may not be as unearthly as they think.
